content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 2, Crystal Palace 1.

Goal!  Chelsea 2, Crystal Palace 1. Patrick van Aanholt (Crystal Palace) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Wilfried Zaha.
